item.description: View in Browser    Did you know that 28% of enterprises have adopted a weekly app release cycle and 27% are releasing app updates every day? Achieving this kind of speed while maintaining the quality your customers expect is possible only with automation. item.description: Kubernetes: AKS vs. EKS vs. GKEKubernetes already won the battle of container orchestration tools. Now AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud each have their own managed Kubernetes version.
